name: atom-codesearch
description: Super-fast search for code using Google CodeSearch

debugMode.title: Debug mode
debugMode.description: Print diagnostic messages to DevTools console

cindex.title: Path to cindex
cindex.description: Path to `cindex` executable, by default will be searched in `$GOPATH/bin` or `$HOME`

csearch.title: Path to csearch
csearch.description: Path to `csearch` executable, by default will be searched in `$GOPATH/bin` or `$HOME`
